codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreHealthcareFacilityTypeCode_TEMP
codeSystems.title: IHE HealthcareFacilityTypeCode_TEMP
codeSystems.description: _TEMP Value set for healthcare facility type code represents the type of organizational setting of the clinical encounter during which the documented act occurred.

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CorePracticeSettingCode_TEMP
codeSystems.title: IHE PracticeSettingCode_TEMP
codeSystems.description: _TEMP Values used for the document metadata attribute practiceSettingCode, which is an attribute specifying the clinical specialty where the act that resulted in the document was performed (e.g., Family Practice, Laboratory, Radiology). The value set is based on a subset of the code list from the SOR lookup table 'SOR-Kliniske specialer' (https://sor.sum.dsdn.dk/lookupdata/#clinical_speciality, accessable on Sundhedsdatanettet (SDN)), which is based on SNOMED codes.

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreClassCode_TEMP
codeSystems.title: IHE ClassCode_TEMP
codeSystems.description: _TEMP Value set for the classCode attribute. classCode used in DK IHE Document sharing

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreConfidentialityCode_TEMP
codeSystems.title: IHE ConfidentialityCode_TEMP
codeSystems.description: _TEMP Confidentiality code used in Danish Document sharing.

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreFormatCode_VS_TEMP
codeSystems.title: IHE FormatCode_TEMP
codeSystems.description: _TEMP ValueSet containing FormatCodes defines by MedCom.

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreDkHomeCommunityId_TEMP
codeSystems.title: _TEMP IHE HomeCommunityId
codeSystems.description: _TEMP List of operational and in production home communities (XCA) in Danish Document Sharing

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreLanguageCode_TEMP
codeSystems.title: IHE LanguageCode_TEMP
codeSystems.description: _TEMP Tags for the Identification of Languages (RFC 3066)

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreMimeType_TEMP
